assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nippon Koei Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides engineering consulting and electric power engineering services in Japan and internationally. It operates through three segments: Consulting, Urban & Spatial Development, and Energy. The Consulting segment engages in operations, such as site surveying, planning, evaluation/assessment, designing, and construction management in the fields of rivers and water resources, water and sewage, agricultural and rural development, dams and power generation, transportation, urban and regional development, geology, disaster prevention, sand control, environment, information systems, etc. The Urban & Spatial Development segment engages in the structuring, planning, design, and operation of urban and spatial development business. The Energy segment engages in manufacturing and sale of electric power equipment and control devices; and planning, designing, construction, and management of mechanical, electrical and communication facilities, as well as energy management business. Nippon Koei Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
